sen.j: 三野園生（みののそのき)は奈良時代の人。
sen.e: MINO no Sonoki was a person of Nara period.
MINO no Sonoki was a person of the Nara period.
MINO no Sonoki was a person of the Nara period.

sen.j: 備前国津高郡津高郷の百姓。
sen.e: He was a peasant of Tsudaka village, Tsudaka County, Bizen Province.
He was a peasant of Tsudaka village, Tsudaka County, Bizen Province.
He was a peasant of Tsudaka village, Tsudaka County, Bizen Province.

sen.j: 宝亀7年12月、税を払うため、田を売って稲17束を得たという。
sen.e: In January 777, he sold his rice field for 17 bundles of rice plant to pay taxes.
In January 777, he sold his rice field for 17 bundles of rice plant to pay taxes.
